- Update dependencies

## v0.6.1

## v0.6.0

- Export front cover as JPEG
- Add --hidden option for convert
- Add --mbid option for tag

## v0.5.0

- Add front cover tagging and export
- Add original album release date

## v0.1.1

## v0.1.0
